title: [Self-Directed] Practitioner Competency Development Program for ODDE Systematic Literature Review Design and Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic research methodologies and general familiarity with digital learning environments
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented course emphasizing analysis of ODDE research trends and systematic application of literature review methodologies in mathematics education

learning_goals: Learners can design systematic review (SR) protocols based on PRISMA guidelines
Learners critically evaluate mathematics education effectiveness research in ODDE fields using meta-analysis techniques
Learners implement research data collection/analysis processes utilizing mobile environments in resource-constrained settings
Learners identify key research themes in post-COVID digital education transformation and assess research quality per theme

resources: Access to Core Literature Database in ODDE (Open Distance and Digital Education) Field
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
